name: Pony Soup
description:
Pony Soup is a merge of AstraliteHeart's Pony Diffusion models (V1, V2, and V3)- as well as the wikiart-v2 and (in V2 Remix) Noise Offset models- and optimizes for coherent SFW My Little Pony pony outputs and variety in art style. It functions well independently but is best used with Ponymaster for the Automatic1111 webui.

Pony Soup is capable of generating 512x512 images, or 768x768 images with 512x512 firstpass using hires. fix (recommended ~0.7 denoise), but 768x768 images without hires. fix often suffer from duplication issues.

If you wish to receive updates on Pony Soup or the Pony Diffusion models, or use the models for free on Discord, check out the Purplesmart.ai Discord.

modelVersions.name: V2 Remix Prunedfp16
modelVersions.description:
No-ema, half-precision version of V2 Remix. Very minor changes from the original V2 Remix.

Incorporates Wikiart-V2, Pony Diffusion V1, Pony Diffusion V2, Pony Diffusion V3, and Noise Offset through precise manual block merging to further improve upon coherency, art style variety, and lighting/contrast at the cost of reduced NSFW capability and non-pony content quality.
